targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp_system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "uptime")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${hostname}")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: 1 }))

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp_system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "cpu_usage_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${hostname}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "snmp_system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "serial_number")
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time"])
  |> yield(name: "serial_number")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "snmp_ip_table")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "ip_address")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value != "127.0.0.1")
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "snmp_system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "description")
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time"])
  |> yield(name: "description")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "snmp_system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "uptime")
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: float(v: r._value) / 100.0 }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time"])
  |> yield(name: "uptime")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "snmp_system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "model")
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time"])
  |> yield(name: "model")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp_system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "cpu_usage_percent")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${hostname}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "snmp_system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "pse_temperature_celsius")
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time"])
  |> yield(name: "pse_temperature_celsius")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "snmp_system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "location")
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time"])
  |> yield(name: "location")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "snmp_system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "firmware_version")
  |> last()
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time"])
  |> yield(name: "firmware_version")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "snmp_poe_system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "power_consumed_watts")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "snmp_poe_system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field =~ /power_consumed_watts|power_available_watts/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

consumed = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "snmp_poe_system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "power_consumed_watts")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

available = from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "snmp_poe_system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "power_available_watts")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

join(tables: {consumed: consumed, available: available}, on: ["_time", "hostname"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: (r._value_consumed / r._value_available) * 100.0 }))
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp_interface")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "oper_status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] == "${interface_prefix}${interfaces}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "snmp_interface_hc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "rx_bytes")
  |> group(columns: ["interface"])
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * 8.0 }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "download")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "snmp_interface_hc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "tx_bytes")
  |> group(columns: ["interface"])
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * 8.0 }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "download")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp_interface")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "oper_status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] == "${interface_prefix}${interfaces}")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp_interface_hc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] == "gi${interfaces}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "rx_bytes")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * 8.0 }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp_interface_hc")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] == "gi${interfaces}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "tx_bytes")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * 8.0 * -1.0 }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp_interface")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] == "${interface_prefix}${interfaces}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "rx_errors")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * 8.0 }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp_interface")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] == "${interface_prefix}${interfaces}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "tx_errors")
  |> derivative(unit: 1s, nonNegative: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with _value: r._value * 8.0 * -1.0 }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp_interface")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "speed_bps")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] == "${interface_prefix}${interfaces}")
  |> last()

list.definition:
buckets()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.name !~ /^_/)  // Exclude system buckets
  |> keep(columns: ["name"])
list.description: This query fetches all buckets, select the one containing the metrics from the switch.
list.name: bucket

query.query:
buckets()
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.name !~ /^_/)  // Exclude system buckets
  |> keep(columns: ["name"])

list.definition:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp_system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "cpu_usage_percent")
  |> group(columns: ["hostname"])
  |> distinct(column: "hostname")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])
list.name: hostname

query.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: -24h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp_system")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "cpu_usage_percent")
  |> group(columns: ["hostname"])
  |> distinct(column: "hostname")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value"])

list.definition:
import "regexp"

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp_interface")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "oper_status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] =~ /^[a-z]+\d+$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] !~ /^loopback/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] !~ /^tunnel/)
  |> keep(columns: ["interface"])
  |> distinct(column: "interface")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      interface: regexp.replaceAllString(r: /\d+$/, v: r.interface, t: "")
    }))
  |> distinct(column: "interface")
list.description:
This function fetches the interface_prefix, in my case this is "gigabitethernet", this also strips "tunnel" and "loopback".
This is used to make the interface_names shorter.
list.name: interface_prefix

query.query:
import "regexp"

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp_interface")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "oper_status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] =~ /^[a-z]+\d+$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] !~ /^loopback/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] !~ /^tunnel/)
  |> keep(columns: ["interface"])
  |> distinct(column: "interface")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      interface: regexp.replaceAllString(r: /\d+$/, v: r.interface, t: "")
    }))
  |> distinct(column: "interface")

list.definition:
import "regexp"

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp_interface")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "oper_status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] =~ /^${interface_prefix}\d+$/)
  |> keep(columns: ["interface"])
  |> distinct(column: "interface")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      interface: regexp.replaceAllString(r: /^${interface_prefix}/, v: r.interface, t: "")
    }))
  |> sort(columns: ["interface"])
list.description:
This query fetches all the numbers after the interface prefix.
If multiple prefixes are found, make sure to set one as default, you may need to unhide the interface_prefix for this.
list.name: interfaces

query.query:
import "regexp"

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp_interface")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["hostname"] == "${hostname}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "oper_status")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["interface"] =~ /^${interface_prefix}\d+$/)
  |> keep(columns: ["interface"])
  |> distinct(column: "interface")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      interface: regexp.replaceAllString(r: /^${interface_prefix}/, v: r.interface, t: "")
    }))
  |> sort(columns: ["interface"])
